attributes.action: Limit the amount that can be borrowed for a mortgage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The property market is being unrealistically inflated due to bad practise from mortgage lenders. It used to be the case that lenders would lend 3 1/2 times a single income and 3 times a joint income so that people did not go into unrepayable debt. Lenders are now lending 5, 6 or 7 times income to get people on the property ladder and this has to stop!
